name: Stratoplex
overview: STRATOPLEX has 7 sequences in total, and 3 of which were inspired by the Disney movie TRON, but they only made 2D video game versions of TRON, in which people for the last dozen years have ALWAYS FAILED to surpass the 1982 original arcade game. Then, about 15 yeasr later, in late 1996, a game worthy of being called the sequal to the MOVIE ITSELF was created by Pete W Storonskij! (oops, that was conceited :)
